hadiths.text: Narrated Salamah ibn al-Akwa': The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) appointed AbuBakr our commander and we fought with some people who were polytheists, and we attacked them at night, killing them. Our war-cry that night was "put to death; put to death." Salamah said: I killed that night with my hand polytheists belonging to seven houses

chapter.eng-name: Attacking The Enemy During The Night
